price: គឺជាបទបញ្ជាដែលចេញពីយើង។ ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើង គឺជាអ្នកបញ្ជូនបណ្ដាអ្នកនាំសារ(ទៅកាន់មនុស្សលោក)
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
